caption.p: (a) Schematic representation of Ald/DOX@Ag 2S for bone tumor therapy; (b) Release kinetics of DOX from Ald/DOX@Ag 2S over time in PBS at pH 5 and 7.4, respectively (Li et al., 2017). (c) Release kinetics of DOX from DOX@ALN-(HA-PASP)CL, GSH (glutathione), DTT (dithiothreitol) (Zhao et al., 2017).
